channel.title: 3 Questions Read Please!
channel.description: 1.Why Do's It Not Work If I Change An NPC's Combat Level And HP? 2.How Can I Do That A NPC Says Text Like: Admin Is Offline! 3.Why Does It Not Work If I Change The Drops Of NPC's? Oh Forgot Fourth Question! 4.How Can I Make New Shops? Forgot More..... How can i make me self the admin? How can i make a working server runner without that he says if i try to login U acount is already logged on.....

item.title: 3 Questions Read Please!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The combat level is client-side, the hitpoints can be done through the npc.cfg file

That can be done in the NPCHandler class, you can make it process every few seconds

The way you changed it isn’t the correct way

Read full topic
